about_the_game:
Explore and escape twisting realms in this dark action puzzle game. Delving through surreal landscapes pocketed throughout the cathedral, Isaiah must confront his deadly sins by warding them off in unique worlds and boss battles. Discover new tools to help you through your journey, and uncover Isaiah's past sins to escape purgatory!



  • Explore and Escape the seven levels of Isaiah's personal hell
  • Outwit monstrous demons and overcome puzzling trials
  • Find useful tools to help you along your journey and interact with your surroundings
  • Platform through unique environments inspired by Isaiah's past
  • Overcome Isaiah's dark past and ultimately decide his fate

content_descriptors.notes: Mature topics such as drug and alcohol abuse, violence, and self-harm/suicide are present in Requiem.

short_description: Requiem stars Isaiah, as he relives his memories and must defeat the demons that inhabit himself. Delving through surreal realms pocketed throughout the cathedral, Isaiah must confront his deadly sins by warding them off in unique worlds and boss battles.
